DOC.brief_summary: This multi-national , multi-center , open-label , single-arm extension study prolongation bone metastasis-free survival men hormone-refractory ( androgen independent ) prostate cancer . Patients currently participate phase 3 study 20050147 ( NCT00286091 ) offer study positive benefit : risk compare placebo determine 20050147 study . The primary endpoint 20050147 study bone metastases-free survival determine time first occurrence bone metastases ( either symptomatic asymptomatic ) death cause . Participants receive open-label denosumab administer every 4 week ( Q4W ) subcutaneously ( SC ) develop bone metastasis 3 year , whichever come first .
DOC.brief_title: Denosumab Prolonging Bone Metastasis-Free Survival Men With Hormone-Refractory Prostate Cancer
